name: Search for the light
description:
A little point and click adventure that you can complete on 5 min. or less.

You wake up in a dark and strange cave where you had never been before and have to figure out how to exit it not being able to see more than some feet away and solving some puzzles.

I'm still finishing this game, so it lacks some things and can have some bugs, if you encounter one, please tell me via the comments bellow.

i hope you enjoy my game and mostly have fun!
